summary: Company website for a pesticide business featuring an animated crops landing page with wind effect, a scroll-driven transition showcasing the Jumbo product, and a shopping/products page listing key products (Salaar, Megamite, Jumbo, Cruzen).
known_issues: Build/configuration error occurred during generation; regeneration requested.

existing_features.title: Create a coherent visual theme for the pesticide company website (color palette, typography, spacing, and component styling) with an earthy/agricultural look-and-feel applied consistently across all pages.
Implement a landing page hero section featuring a smooth, wind-like moving crops animation (continuous motion) as the primary visual focus on initial load.
Add scroll-driven animation that transitions from the animated crops hero into a product showcase that highlights the company product named "Jumbo" (clear reveal/transition tied to scroll position).
Create a shopping/products page that lists the company products: Salaar, Megamite, Jumbo, and Cruzen, with a consistent product card layout.
Add basic shopping interactions on the shop page: ability to add/remove products to a local cart and view a cart summary (item count and subtotal) without requiring payment processing.
Connect the frontend shop page to the backend product catalog API using React Query for loading and caching product data.
Add a simple site structure with at least a landing route and a shop route, including a top navigation element (or equivalent) to move between them.
Add generated image assets to the frontend as static files and render them in the landing and shop pages as appropriate.

Update the top-left brand area in the header (TopNav) by replacing the current logo icon (Lucide Sprout SVG) and the adjacent brand text ("AgriProtect") with the uploaded logo image file (SanofilLogo-removebg-preview.png), while keeping the brand area as a clickable control that navigates to the homepage route "/" from any page.

Adjust the sizing and spacing of the new header logo image so it fits cleanly within the existing header height (h-16), does not overflow, and maintains visually balanced padding/gap relative to surrounding nav elements.

Increase the rendered size of the header brand logo image element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/div[1]/a[1]/img[1] so it is visibly larger (similar to the prominence of the previous brand text), while still fitting cleanly within the existing header height (h-16) without overflowing or being clipped.

new_feature_requests.summary: Landing page with smooth moving crops animation (wind effect)
Scroll-driven motion leading into a transition that reveals/highlights the 'Jumbo' product
Shopping/products page listing company products (Salaar, Megamite, Jumbo, Cruzen)
Implement backend product catalog storage and query APIs in the single Motoko main actor to serve the product list (Salaar, Megamite, Jumbo, Cruzen) to the frontend.
Replace current navbar logo with provided Agriproject logo image, scale/adjust spacing, and make it a clickable button linking to the homepage ("/") from all pages.

projectName: Pesticide company website with animated crops landing page, scroll-driven Jumbo reveal, and shop page
